name: Dr. Priya Sharma
bio: Dr. Priya Sharma is a highly experienced cardiologist specializing in interventional cardiology and heart failure management. She has performed over 500 successful cardiac procedures.

name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
bio: Dr. Rajesh Kumar is a renowned neurologist with expertise in stroke management, epilepsy, and movement disorders. He has published numerous research papers in international journals.

name: Dr. Ananya Reddy
bio: Dr. Ananya Reddy specializes in sports medicine, joint replacement surgeries, and trauma management. She has successfully treated athletes and performed complex orthopedic procedures.

name: Dr. Vikram Singh
bio: Dr. Vikram Singh is a compassionate pediatrician with extensive experience in child healthcare, vaccinations, and developmental disorders. Parents trust him for his gentle approach.

name: Dr. Meera Patel
bio: Dr. Meera Patel provides comprehensive primary care services including diagnosis and treatment of common medical conditions, preventive care, and chronic disease management.

name: Dr. Arun Verma
bio: Dr. Arun Verma is a skilled dermatologist specializing in cosmetic dermatology, laser treatments, and management of skin disorders. He stays updated with latest dermatological advances.

name: Dr. Lakshmi Iyer
bio: Dr. Lakshmi Iyer is an expert ENT surgeon with proficiency in endoscopic sinus surgery, ear microsurgery, and voice disorders. She has performed numerous successful surgeries.

name: Dr. Kavitha Menon
bio: Dr. Kavitha Menon is a highly regarded gynecologist specializing in high-risk pregnancies, minimally invasive gynecological surgeries, and women's reproductive health.

name: Dr. Arjun Desai
bio: Dr. Arjun Desai is a compassionate psychiatrist specializing in anxiety disorders, depression, and addiction management. He provides evidence-based treatment with a patient-centered approach.

name: Dr. Sanjay Nair
bio: Dr. Sanjay Nair is an accomplished ophthalmologist specializing in cataract surgery, corneal transplants, and retinal disorders. He has restored vision for thousands of patients.
